channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AstraZeneca makes deal with White House to lower drug prices
item.description: The U.K.-based drugmaker became the second to strike a deal with the Trump administration as part of the president's push to rein in U.S. drug prices.

item.title: Gaza ceasefire in effect, Israel says, as hostage release countdown begins
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu vows "Hamas will disarm," the easy way or the hard way, as Israel's military says a Gaza ceasefire is in eff...

item.title: 10/10: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Why some federal workers are receiving layoff notices; Reporter's Notebook: Using power for good

item.title: What to know about National Guard deployments in Memphis and other cities
Denmark to boost Greenland defence with new ships, jets and HQ
item.description: Denmark will buy US F-35 fighter jets and new ships to defend Greenland - a resource-rich Danish territory that President Trump wants to control.

item.title: 10/6: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Breaking down dispute over Trump's latest National Guard deployment; Reporter's Notebook: When Trump tests presidential power

item.title: Rare wildflowers blanket Atacama desert
item.description: One of the world's driest deserts is transformed into a sea of wildflowers after a rare bloom.

item.title: Government shutdown stretches on as thousands of federal workers face layoffs

item.title: Trump administration starts laying off thousands of workers
item.description: More than 4,000 workers across seven agencies will receive notices that their jobs are being cut, the government disclosed in a court filing.

item.title: Las Vegas Aces defeat Mercury to claim third WNBA title in 4 seasons

item.title: Icebreakers and golf spark Trump and Finnish leader's unlikely friendship
item.description: Alexander Stubb has become a key voice for Europe at the White House amid the Ukraine war.

item.title: 'They treated us like animals' - Inside the epicentre of deportations in New York City
item.description: Chaotic scenes have become routine in a federal immigration court in Manhattan.

item.title: Macron puts Lecornu back as France's prime minister just days after he quit

item.title: Blast at a Tennessee explosives plant leaves 18 missing and feared dead, sheriff says
item.description: Officials say an explosion at a Tennessee explosives plant has left 18 people missing and feared dead.

item.title: National Guard stands down in Illinois while troops patrol in Memphis with local police
